{{cpp/utility/functional/function/title | assign}}
{{cpp/utility/functional/function/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=c++11 | removed=c++17 |
template&lt; class F, class Alloc &gt;
void assign( F&amp;&amp; f, const Alloc&amp; alloc );
}}

Initializes the ''target'' with {{tt|f}}. The {{tt|alloc}} is used to allocate memory for any internal data structures that the {{tt|function}} might use.

Equivalent to {{c|function(std::allocator_arg, alloc, std::forward&lt;F&gt;(f)).swap(*this);}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | f | callable function to initialize the ''target'' with}}
{{par | alloc | allocator to use to allocate memory for the internal data structures}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
(none)

{{cpp/impldef exception}}
